changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Unique identifier parent bigint NOT NULL, -- The last service of a given protocol that was completed status_code bigint NOT NULL, -- The status of the last service completed sequence_number ruleform.sequence_number NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, -- Ordering and uniqueness, for when -- a service / Status Code combination can trigger multiple child services next_child bigint, -- A child job with an product equal to this can have its status changed next_child_status bigint, -- The status to set for the child job referred to by "next_child" parent_status_to_set bigint, -- The status to set for the parent job, provided it has an product equal to "my_parent" notes character varying, -- Additional notes regarding usage of this particular rule research bigint, -- Indicates that a rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The Resource that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The date this rule was last changed CONSTRAINT product_child_sequencing_authorization_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT product_child_sequencing_authorization_next_child_fkey FOREIGN KEY (next_child) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_child_sequencing_authorization_next_child_status_fkey FOREIGN KEY (next_child_status) REFERENCES ruleform.status_code (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_child_sequencing_authorization_parent_fkey FOREIGN KEY (parent) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_child_sequencing_authorization_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_child_sequencing_authorization_status_code_fkey FOREIGN KEY (status_code) REFERENCES ruleform.status_code (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_child_sequencing_authorization_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_child_sequencing_authorization_parent_status_code_sequ_key UNIQUE (parent , status_code , sequence_number ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization IS 'Determines what the next available product should be, based on the status code returned for the previous product'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.id IS 'Unique identifier'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.parent IS 'The last product of a given protocol that was completed'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.status_code IS 'The status of the last product completed'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.sequence_number IS 'Ordering and uniqueness, for when a product / Status Code combination can trigger multiple child products'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.next_child IS 'A child job with an product equal to this can have its status changed'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.next_child_status IS 'The status to set for the child job referred to by "next_child"'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.notes IS 'Additional notes regarding usage of this particular rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.research IS 'Indicates that a rule needs to be researched or investigated to resolve a potential problem'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.updated_by IS 'The Resource that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_child_sequencing_authorization.update_date IS 'The date this rule was last changed';
